timeline.bodyText:
Lets rename this now that its an extended class controller
Maybe
OSLocationController?
OneSignalLocationController?

replies.bodyText: I think it is fine to leave for now.
replies.author: jkasten2

replies.bodyText: Actually I will like a full refactor for location, but out scope for now.
replies.author: Jeasmine

timeline.bodyText: Why wrap OSUtils.isHuaweiDeviceType(); when we can just use it directly?
timeline.author: mikechoch

replies.bodyText: This wrapping makes the code where isHMSAvailable() is called more readable so I think this is preferred.
replies.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText: Why wrap OSUtils.isAndroidDeviceType(); when we can just use it directly?
timeline.author: mikechoch

replies.bodyText: This wrapping makes the code where isGooglePlayServicesAvailable() is called more readable so I think this is preferred.
replies.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText:
We should check for location permission here before attempting to access GMSLocationController or HMSLocationController.
Otherwise NoClassDefFoundError will print in the logcat if they are don't have the location library in their app.
